amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. 5__. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to implement, carry out, administer, or enforce section 1308(h) of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 4015(h)).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to implement, carry out, administer, or enforce section 1308(h) of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 4015(h)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cassidy amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 146 (Roll no. 203).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cassidy amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 146 (Roll no. 203).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Cassidy.
